subject: Golf
Ryder Cup (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Kenny Perry, had a three-under-par 69 for a total of eight-under 280 and a two-stroke victory over Mathew Goggin, Mike Weir, Jerry Kelly and Justin Rose on Sunday.
snippet: Kenny Perry, had a three-under-par 69 for a total of eight-under 280 and a two-stroke victory over Mathew Goggin, Mike Weir, Jerry Kelly and Justin Rose on Sunday.
